original_text: For it came to pass, when Solomon was old, that his wives turned away his heart after other gods: and his heart was not perfect with the Lord his God, as was the heart of David his father.
korean_text: 솔로몬의 나이가 많을 때에 그의 여인들이 그의 마음을 돌려 다른 신들을 따르게 하였으므로 왕의 마음이 그의 아버지 다윗의 마음과 같지 아니하여 그의 하나님 여호와 앞에 온전하지 못하였으니

sentences.original_text: that his wives turned away his heart
and his heart was not perfect with Lord his God
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 마음은 그의 하나님 여호와와 온전하지 못하였으니

sentences.original_text: as was heart of David his father
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 다윗의 마음 같지 아니하였더라
